title: Stage Lv10-S10
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Oh wow, really? I had no idea!
Oh my goodness, I can't believe it!
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Oh wow, really? I had no idea!
Oh my goodness, I can't believe it!
Seriously? That totally caught me off guard!

sentences.kr: 말도 안 돼! 어떻게 그런 일이?
sentences.en: No way! How on earth did that happen?

sentences.kr: 와, 정말 대단하다! 상상도 못 했어.
sentences.en: Wow, that's incredible! I never would have imagined.

sentences.kr: 어떻게 그럴 수가 있지? 정말 신기해.
sentences.en: How is that even possible? That's absolutely fascinating.
That's amazing! Who would have thought such things happen?
